content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR PERSONNEL AREA--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_personnel_area
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

PersonnelAreaID         AS PersonnelAreaKey,
PersonnelAreaCode       AS PersonnelAreaCode, 
Description             AS PersonnelArea,
IsActive                AS IsActive,
IngestionDate           AS IngestionDate,
ValidTo                 AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_personnel_area_dim

GO
